content: We are open Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
Gemma Burger is located at 123 AI Boulevard, Silicon Valley, CA 94000.
You can contact us at contact@gemmaburger.ai or call +1-800-GEMMA-AI.
We offer full refunds if the food is cold. Please keep your receipt.
Free Wifi is available. SSID: Gemma_Guest, Password: burger_love
